227:2: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
227:4: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavānbhāgyātiśayaguṇādutthānasampadā cādhigatavipuladhanasamṛddhiraviṣamavyavahāraśīlatvālloke bahumānaniketabhūta udārābhijanavānanekavidyākalāvikalpādhigamavimalataramatirguṇamāhātmyādrājñā samupahṛtasammānaḥ pradānaśīlatvāllokasādhāraṇavibhavaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva|
227:6: tyāgaśauryonnataṃ nāma tasya vyāpa diśo daśa||1||
227:10: sattvārthiduḥkhaṃ na śaśāka soḍhuṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ ca tato jugopa||3||
227:11: atha kadācittasya mahāsattvasya bhojanakāle snātānuliptagātrasya kuśalodārasūdopakalpite samupasthitevarṇagandharasasparśādiguṇasamudite vicitre bhakṣyabhojyādividhau tatpuṇyasambhārābhivṛddhikāmo jñānāgninirdagdhasarvakleśendhanaḥ pratyekabuddhastadgṛhamabhijagāma bhikṣārthī|
227:15: atha māraḥ pāpīyānbodhisattvasya tāṃ dānasampadamamṛṣyamāṇastadvidhnārthamantarā ca taṃ bhadantamantarā ca dvāradehalīṃ pracalajvālākarālodaramanekapauruṣamatigambhīraṃ bhayānakadarśanaṃ sapratibhayanirghoṣaṃ narakamabhinirmame visphuradbhiranekairjanaśatairācitam|
227:16: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ bhikṣārthinamabhigatamālokya patnīmuvāca-bhadre ! svayamāryāya paryāptaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehīti|
227:17: sā tatheti pratiśrutya praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya prasthitā|
227:19: kimetaditi ca bhartrā paryanuyuktā samāpatitasādhvasāpihitakaṇṭhī tatkathañcittasmai kathayāmāsa|
227:20: atha bodhisattvaḥ kathamayamāryo madgṛhādanavāptabhikṣa eva pratiyāsyatīti sasambhramaṃ tattasyāḥ kathitamanādṛtya svayameva ca praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya tasya mahātmanaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitukāmo dvārakoṣṭhakasamīpamabhigatastamatibhīṣaṇamantarā narakaṃ dadarśa|
227:21: tasya kiṃ svididamiti samutpannavitarkasya māraḥ pāpīyānbhavanabhitterviniḥsṛtya saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhūtavapurantarikṣe sthitvā hitakāma iva nāmābravīt-gṛhapate mahārauravanāmāyaṃ mahānarakaḥ|
227:24: arthastrivargasya viśeṣahetustasminhate kena hato na dharmaḥ|
227:25: dharmaṃ ca hatvārthanibarhaṇena kathaṃ nu na syānnarakapratiṣṭhaḥ||6||
227:26: dānaprasaṅgena ca dharmamūlaṃ ghnatā tvayārthaṃ yadakāri pāpam|
227:28: tatsādhu dānādviniyaccha buddhimevaṃ hi sadyaḥpatanaṃ na te syāt|
227:32: atha bodhisattvo nūnamasyaitaddurātmano mama dānavighnāya viceṣṭitamityavagamya sattvāvaṣṭambhadhīraṃ vinayamadhurāvicchedaṃ niyatamityavocadenam|
227:34: yuktā viśeṣeṇa ca daivateṣu parānukampānipuṇā pravṛttiḥ||10||
227:35: doṣodayātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā yuktaṃ tu tacchāntipathena gantum|
227:37: idaṃ ca dānavyasanaṃ madīyaṃ śaṅke cikitsāviṣayavyatītam|
227:38: tathā hyanādṛtya hitaiṣitāṃ te na me manaḥ saṅkacati pradānāt||12||
227:39: dānādadharmaṃ ca yadūcivāṃstvamarthaṃ ca dharmasya viśeṣahetum|
227:41: nidhīyamānaḥ sa nu dharmahetuścauraiḥ prasahyātha vilupyamānaḥ|
227:43: yaccāttha dātā narakaṃ prayāti pratigrahītā tu surendralokam|
227:44: vivardhitastena ca me tvayā'yaṃ dānodyamaḥ saṃyamayiṣyatāpi||15||
227:45: ananyathā cāstu vacastavedaṃ svargaṃ ca me yācanakā vrajantu|
227:46: dānaṃ hi me lokahitārthamiṣṭaṃ nedaṃ svasaukhyodayasādhanāya||16||
227:47: atha sa māraḥ pāpīyānpunarapi bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣīva dhīrahastenovāca-
227:48: hitoktimetāṃ mama cāpalaṃ vā samīkṣya yenecchasi tena gaccha|
227:49: sukhānvito vā bahumānapūrvaṃ smartāsi māṃ vipratisāravānvā||17||
227:55: ityuktvā bodhisattvaḥ svabhāgyabalāvaṣṭambhājjānānaśca niratyayatāṃ dānasya nivāraṇaikarasamavadhūya svajanaparijanaṃ sādhvasānabhibhūtamatirabhivṛddhadānābhilāṣo narakamadhyena prāyāt|
227:58: atha bodhisattvaḥ padmasaṃkrameṇa svapuṇyātiśayanirjātenābhigamya pratyekabuddhaṃ prasādasaṃharṣāpūrṇahṛdayaḥ piṇḍapātamasmai prāyacchat|
227:62: tamabhimukhamudīkṣituṃ na sehe saha narakeṇa tatastirobabhūva||21||
227:65: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt ?
